name: Snowy's Quest (CES Demo)
description:
I was searching through some old boxes from when I worked at Loco Games when I found a PC disk for a CES demo for a game called Snowy's Quest which we canceled when the company went under in '96.

Snowy's Quest (CES Demo) is a PS1-inspired game made for the 32 Bit Holiday Jam 2021, (I know it's not exactly 3D but I tried my best.)

Controls: Right & Left arrows to move, A to climb up ladders, and Z & X to fire snowballs. Note: 1 second reload per snowball.
